verses.text: Will you \w for|strong="H1732"\w* ever put me out \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* memory, O Lord? will \w your|strong="H1732"\w* face \w for|strong="H1732"\w* ever \w be|strong="H1732"\w* turned away from me?

\w How|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* doubt, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* sorrow \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* day? \w how|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* given power \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* voice come \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3119"\w* give \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w an|strong="H7311"\w* answer, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* light \w be|strong="H5315"\w* shining \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w so|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sleep \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* say, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* overcome \w him|strong="H0430"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* troubling \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* moved.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* faith \w in|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* mercy; \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart will \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w song|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* reward.
